price: Basi naapa kwa Mola Mlezi wa mashariki zote na magharibi zote kwamba Sisi tunaweza
arabic: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلۡمَشَٰرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغَٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَٰدِرُونَ
footnotes: Naapa kwa Mola Mlezi wa mashariki zote, na magharibi zote za siku, na sayari na hidaya, kwamba hakika bila ya shaka Sisi tuna uweza wa kuwaangamiza,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: falā uq'simu birabbi al-mashāriqi wal-maghāribi innā laqādirūna
